concept.title: March 9, 2017
concept.shortdesc: Release Notes for the March 9, 2017 release.

row.entry: Fixed a bug to show content in media modals with the correct aspect ratios.
Enhanced Comments to support more accessibility standards including font colors and alt-text.
As of March 9. 2017 Community Comments will be in read-only mode.
Fixed a bug in the collection validator.
Enhanced Storify 2 to support the ability to allow multiple Storify 2 apps on the same page.
Added functionality to increase the expiry time for Studio User login sessions. Once a Studio session expires the user will be redirected to log in again.
Fixed a bug that was caused Media Walls to not render if specific foreign characters were included.
Fixed a bug that prevented saved Youtube assets in Social Search from publishing.
Fixed a bug that caused the “Conceal explicit images” Eye icon on assets to shift outside of an asset on hover.
Added an enhancement to display the message “No results found” on Facebook Topic search when no results are found.
Added Summary Rules for SAFE Rules to the bottom of a Twitter Stream page.
Added an enhancement to visibly disable the “verified user” checkbox on Twitter Stream Rules when excluded authors are provided.
Fixed a bug that was preventing the “Feature Tag” to save correctly when applied.
Fixed a bug that caused the “Recent Activity” sort filter in Users to appear out of order.
